additional.title: Additional Information
additional.bringDescription: To enjoy our tour to the fullest, we recommend bringing the following items:
additional.description: Your comfort and safety are our priority, so don’t forget these essential items for an amazing day in Bacalar.
additional.restrictionsDescription: To ensure the safety and comfort of all our passengers, please take the following restrictions into consideration before booking:

restrictionItems.label: Pregnant women
restrictionItems.text: We recommend that women over 7 months pregnant consult their doctor before participating in the tour, as it may not be suitable for safety reasons.

restrictionItems.label: People with reduced mobility or wheelchair users
restrictionItems.text: Due to the nature of boarding and the facilities on board, unfortunately, we do not have adequate access for individuals with limited mobility or those in wheelchairs.

restrictionItems.label: Alcohol consumption
restrictionItems.text: While we offer moderate alcoholic beverages on board, we kindly ask our guests to drink responsibly. Excessive alcohol consumption may compromise the safety and enjoyment of the experience for everyone.

additional.extrasDescription: Our team is here to ensure you have a safe and pleasant experience, and we appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
additional.disclaimersDescription: Before boarding our tours with Sail Bacalar, it is important that clients understand and accept the inherent risks associated with water activities and sailing.

disclaimerItems.label: Risks and safety
disclaimerItems.text: Sailing involves certain natural risks. Although we take measures to ensure safety, guests should be aware of possible risks such as falls or physical discomfort.

disclaimerItems.label: Health and conditions
disclaimerItems.text: Participants must be in good health and inform us of any medical conditions before the tour.

disclaimerItems.label: Personal responsibility
disclaimerItems.text: It is mandatory to follow the captain’s instructions and use the safety equipment provided.

disclaimerItems.label: Personal belongings
disclaimerItems.text: We are not responsible for the loss or damage of personal items.

disclaimerItems.label: Weather conditions
disclaimerItems.text: The itinerary may change for safety reasons if weather conditions require it.

disclaimerItems.label: Liability release
disclaimerItems.text: By signing, participants release Sailing Colibrí from any responsibility for accidents or injuries not caused by gross negligence.

faqItems.question: Is this activity suitable for children? From what age?
faqItems.answer: Yes, absolutely! Children can join the tour starting from 6 months old. It’s a safe and family-friendly experience.

faqItems.question: Can I bring extra food or drinks?
faqItems.answer: Yes, you can. We have enough space on board and a cooler with ice to keep your drinks and food fresh during the tour.

faqItems.question: Can you pick me up at the hotel dock where I’m staying?
faqItems.answer: Sorry, we do not offer that service due to the time required for that maneuver. We will meet at our designated departure point to ensure everything runs on time and stays organized.

faqItems.question: Do you provide life jackets and safety equipment?
faqItems.answer: Yes, all safety equipment is in perfect condition and fully compliant with regulations. We have life jackets available for both adults and children.

faqItems.question: Do I need prior experience to navigate?
faqItems.answer: No, you don’t need any previous experience. Our expert bilingual captains will take care of the navigation — you just need to relax and enjoy the scenery.

faqItems.question: Is the tour private or shared?
faqItems.answer: We offer both private and shared tours. However, if you prefer an exclusive experience just for you and your group, this is the perfect option to choose.

cancellations.title: Cancellations
cancellations.description: Customers will receive a full refund or the option to reschedule if the cancellation is made at least 48 hours in advance. Customers will also receive a full refund or the option to reschedule in case the operator cancels due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. No-shows will be charged the full price.
cancellations.timeSchedule: If the customer does not arrive at the agreed time, the time will simply be deducted from the total duration of the tour. The boat will not depart until the customer arrives, but it will return at the originally scheduled end time.
cancellations.reschedule: Please contact us by email to cancel or inquire about rescheduling.

classic.title: Classic Private Tour
classic.idealFor: Families, couples, or groups of friends looking for a relaxed and private tour.
classic.description: Set sail on a private adventure in the breathtaking Bacalar Lagoon with our 30-foot catamaran. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying time with family, or creating unforgettable moments with friends, this personalized tour is designed just for you. Swim in pristine waters, soak up the beauty of the lagoon, and indulde in snacks and drinks onboard. Discover Bacalar from a whole new perspective with a fully customizable experience.

allInclusive.title: ALL INCLUSIVE PRIVATE TOUR
allInclusive.idealFor: Families, couples, and groups of friends seeking a relaxed experience with drinks and fresh snacks.
allInclusive.description: Set sail on a private all-inclusive catamaran tour across the breathtaking Bacalar Lagoon. Designed exclusively for your group, this experience includes swimming in crystal-clear waters, relaxing as you take in the lagoon’s beauty, and enjoying a selection of drinks and fresh snacks onboard. Discover Bacalar from a new perspective with a fully personalized and carefree experience.
included: Day Pass Asana Glamping (Bathroom and showers available)

allDay.title: all day private tour
allDay.idealFor: Families, couples, or groups of friends looking for a full-day, relaxed lagoon experience.
allDay.description: Set sail on a private all-day catamaran tour across the breathtaking Bacalar Lagoon. Designed exclusively for your group, this extended experience gives you plenty of time to swim in crystal-clear waters, relax, and explore hidden spots far away from crowded, touristic areas. Savor refreshing drinks and fresh snacks onboard while discovering Bacalar from a new perspective in a truly personalized and carefree way.
included: Day Pass Asana Glamping (Bathroom and showers available)

romantic.title: romanitc privat tour
romantic.idealFor: Couples looking to celebrate love in a peaceful and intimate setting.
romantic.description: Experience Bacalar Lagoon on a private romantic catamaran tour created for two. Discover hidden, peaceful spots, enjoy time swimming and relaxing in pristine waters, and savor drinks and fresh snacks as you take in the lagoon’s breathtaking beauty. An unforgettable escape made for love and connection.

Day Pass Asana Glamping (Bathroom and showers available)

sunrise.title: Sunrise private Sail tour
sunrise.idealFor: Early risers, couples, and nature lovers seeking a peaceful sunrise experience on the lagoon.

As the first light reflects on the crystal-clear waters, enjoy the calm atmosphere, gentle sailing, and the lagoon’s natural beauty. Swim in peaceful waters, savor light refreshments onboard, and experience Bacalar at its most tranquil.
included: Day Pass Asana Glamping (Bathroom and showers available)
